name: Lesson Planning Template
description:
This was a lesson planning template I created to use for teaching. I developed this after a few rounds of trial and error. Hope that this template is useful for you!


It comes with the following sections

  • header
  • week day
  • duration
  • topic
  • concepts
  • keywords
  • previous lesson
  • collect homework
  • objectives
  • timing of activities
  • next lesson
  • homework


I'm a learning experience designer and love to talk about education, design, art and more.

https://meganmiao.com/
